name: The HOSPITAL TRUST LEASING COMPANY v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator
name_abbreviation: Hospital Trust Leasing Co. v. Norberg

parties: The HOSPITAL TRUST LEASING COMPANY v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.

attorneys: Edwards & Angelí, Alfred S. Lombardi, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles E. Goldkamp, Legal Officer, Division of Taxation, North Kingstown, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
The HOSPITAL TRUST LEASING COMPANY v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 82-276-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
July 1, 1982.
Edwards & Angelí, Alfred S. Lombardi, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles E. Goldkamp, Legal Officer, Division of Taxation, North Kingstown, for respondent.
